💛 soroban

Statistics functions compatible with shiny

📋 Dependency

  • caret - 6.0-93
  • colourpicker - 1.1.0
  • dplyr - 1.0.10
  • factoextra - 1.0.7
  • partykit - 1.2-16
  • plotly - 4.10.0
  • reactable - 0.3.0
  • shinyjs - 2.1.0
  • showtext - 0.9-5

🔧 Install 

remotes::install_github('statgarten/soroban')
library(soroban)

👍 Recommended package to use soroban

  • datamods
  • door

😊 Authors

  • :octocat: JInhwan Kim @jhk0530
